midas/gui/hvedit/qt/hvAdmin.cpp

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*******************************************************************************************
00002 
00003   hvAdmin.cpp
00004 
00005   Administration class to encapsulate midas online data base (ODB) settings.
00006 
00007   The constructor tries to read the file '$HOME/.qt/hveditrc' in which all the relevant
00008   ODB pathes can be given. If '$HOME/.qt/hveditrc' does not exist, some default settings
00009   will be tried.
00010   
00011   Sample 'hveditrc' file:
00012     # hveditrc
00013     # Adminstration file for hvEdit
00014     #
00015     # this file should be placed in $HOME/.qt,
00016     #
00017     # Andreas Suter, 2003/10/27
00018     #
00019 
00020     [General]
00021     DEFAULT_SETTING_DIR=.
00022     DEFAULT_DOC_DIR=gui/hvedit/qt/doc
00023 
00024     [ODB Keys]
00025     MIDAS_KEY_HV_ROOT=/Equipment/HV
00026     MIDAS_KEY_HV_NAMES=Settings/Names
00027     MIDAS_KEY_HV_DEMAND=Variables/Demand
00028     MIDAS_KEY_HV_MEASURED=Variables/Measured
00029     MIDAS_KEY_HV_CURRENT=Variables/Current
00030     MIDAS_KEY_HV_CURRENT_LIMIT=Settings/Current Limit
00031     
00032     # end of hveditrc
00033 
00034 *********************************************************************************************
00035 
00036     begin                : Andreas Suter, 2002/11/22
00037     modfied:             :
00038     copyright            : (C) 2003 by
00039     email                : andreas.suter@psi.ch
00040

00077 //#include <stdlib.h>
00078 
00079 #include <qstring.h>
00080 #include <qsettings.h>
00081 
00082 #include "midas.h"
00083 
00084 #include "hvAdmin.h"
00085 
00086 //**********************************************************************
00092 hvAdmin::hvAdmin()
00093 {
00094   QSettings settings;
00095   QString   midas_root;
00096 
00097   // initialize flags for ODB pathes
00098   b_hvA_default_dir_hv_settings = FALSE;
00099   b_hvA_default_dir_docu = FALSE;
00100   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_root = FALSE;
00101   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_names = FALSE;
00102   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_demand = FALSE;
00103   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_measured = FALSE;
00104   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current = FALSE;
00105   b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current_limit = FALSE;
00106 
00107   // read all the setting keys
00108   hvA_default_dir_hv_settings = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/General/DEFAULT_SETTING_DIR", ".", &b_hvA_default_dir_hv_settings);
00109   hvA_default_dir_docu = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/General/DEFAULT_DOC_DIR", "gui/hvedit/qt/doc", &b_hvA_default_dir_docu);
00110   hvA_midas_odb_hv_root = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_ROOT", "/Equipment/HV", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_root);
00111   hvA_midas_odb_hv_names = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_NAMES", "Settings/Names", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_names);
00112   hvA_midas_odb_hv_demand = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_DEMAND", "Variables/Demand", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_demand);
00113   hvA_midas_odb_hv_measured = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_MEASURED", "Variables/Measured", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_measured);
00114   hvA_midas_odb_hv_current = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_CURRENT", "Variables/Current", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current);
00115   hvA_midas_odb_hv_current_limit = settings.readEntry("/hvEdit/ODB Keys/MIDAS_KEY_HV_CURRENT_LIMIT", "Settings/Current Limit", &b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current_limit);
00116 
00117   // add $MIDAS_ROOT to hvA_default_dir_docu
00118   midas_root = getenv("MIDAS_ROOT");
00119   if (midas_root.isNull()) { // haven't found $MIDAS_ROOT use current directory
00120     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Haven't found $MIDAS_ROOT use current directory.");
00121     midas_root = ".";
00122   }
00123   hvA_default_dir_docu = midas_root+"/"+hvA_default_dir_docu;
00124 
00125   // check if '$HOME/.qt/hvEdit' could be read
00126   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_root) {
00127     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV root path settings, will try '/Equipment/HV' instead.");
00128   }
00129   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_names) {
00130     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV names path settings, will try 'Settings/Names' instead.");
00131   }
00132   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_demand) {
00133     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV demand path settings, will try 'Variables/Demand' instead.");
00134   }
00135   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_measured) {
00136     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV measured path settings, will try 'Variables/Measured' instead.");
00137   }
00138   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current) {
00139     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV current path settings, will try 'Variables/Current' instead.");
00140   }
00141   if (!b_hvA_midas_odb_hv_current_limit) {
00142     cm_msg(MINFO, "hvAdmin", "hvEdit: Warning: Couldn't read ODB HV demand path settings, will try 'Settings/Current Limit' instead.");
00143   }
00144 }
00145 
00146 //**********************************************************************
00150 hvAdmin::~hvAdmin()
00151 {
00152 }
